languages.text: {n}Кабалиты Опустошительной бури не торопятся исполнять волю своего нового покровителя. Вы замечаете взгляды, устремленные на Маражая — кажется, его появление заставило кое-кого из предателей сомневаться в своем выборе.{/n}

{n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кабалиты Опустошительной бури не торопятся исполнять волю своего нового покровителя. Вы замечаете взгляды, устремленные на Маражая — кажется, его появление заставило кое-кого из предателей сомневаться в своем выборе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai, it looks like his appearance has made some of the renegades question their choices.{/n}

{n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai, it looks like his appearance has made some of the renegades question their choices.{/n}

{n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

{n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

{n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Mitglieder der Kabale des plündernden Sturms haben keine Eile, den Willen ihres neuen Patrons auszuführen. Du bemerkst, wie sie Marazhai ansehen. Seine Ankunft hat einige der Verräter offenbar ihre Entscheidungen hinterfragen lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mitglieder der Kabale des plündernden Sturms haben keine Eile, den Willen ihres neuen Patrons auszuführen. Du bemerkst, wie sie Marazhai ansehen. Seine Ankunft hat einige der Verräter offenbar ihre Entscheidungen hinterfragen lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}狂风阴谋团的战士并没有急于执行新赞助人的意愿。你注意到，许多黑暗灵族朝玛拉斋投来目光，似乎他的到来，让一部分背叛者怀疑起了自己之前的选择。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狂风阴谋团的战士并没有急于执行新赞助人的意愿。你注意到，许多黑暗灵族朝玛拉斋投来目光，似乎他的到来，让一部分背叛者怀疑起了自己之前的选择。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Kabalites de la Tempête ravageuse ne se précipitent pas pour obéir à leur nouveau chef. Vous décelez des regards dirigés vers Marazhai — son arrivée semble remettre en question le choix de certains renégats.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Kabalites de la Tempête ravageuse ne se précipitent pas pour obéir à leur nouveau chef. Vous décelez des regards dirigés vers Marazhai — son arrivée semble remettre en question le choix de certains renégats.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Kabalistas de la Tempestad Asoladora no tienen mucha prisa por hacer la voluntad de su nuevo patrón. Notas que todas las miradas recaen sobre Marazhai. Su llegada ha hecho que varios de los traidores cuestionen sus propias decisiones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Kabalistas de la Tempestad Asoladora no tienen mucha prisa por hacer la voluntad de su nuevo patrón. Notas que todas las miradas recaen sobre Marazhai. Su llegada ha hecho que varios de los traidores cuestionen sus propias decisiones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}略奪の嵐のカバライトは、自分たちの新たな支援者の望みを実行することに前向きではない。あなたはマラズハイに向けられる数々の視線に気づく。彼の到着により、裏切り者の中には自分たちのした選択に疑いを持ちはじめた者もいるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}略奪の嵐のカバライトは、自分たちの新たな支援者の望みを実行することに前向きではない。あなたはマラズハイに向けられる数々の視線に気づく。彼の到着により、裏切り者の中には自分たちのした選択に疑いを持ちはじめた者もいるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müfteris Kasırga Kabalistleri, yeni liderlerinin isteğini yerine getirmek için acele etmiyorlar. Bakışların Marazhai üzerinde yoğunlaştığını fark ediyorsun. Gelişi, döneklerin bazılarına seçimlerini sorgulatmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest are in no hurry to carry out the will of their new patron. You notice the looks directed at Marazhai — it seems his arrival has made some of the turncoats question their choices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Müfteris Kasırga Kabalistleri, yeni liderlerinin isteğini yerine getirmek için acele etmiyorlar. Bakışların Marazhai üzerinde yoğunlaştığını fark ediyorsun. Gelişi, döneklerin bazılarına seçimlerini sorgulatmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
